brainbox.simulation: Tools for simulating dataÂ¶

The simulation module is intended to be a place for functions that simulate data in a very simple way. Brainbox does not aim to supplant the many other excellent neural simulation projects, such as Brian, and as such this module is limited to only basic synthetic data generation for testing purposes.
